==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=irr|sort=おはこ}}

===Etymology===
Literally "a box", the kanji used to write it mean "number 18". From the fact that the [[w:Ichikawa Danjūrō|Ichikawa]] family of kabuki performers would store their [[w:Kabuki Jūhachiban|kabuki jūhachiban]] scripts in a box.

===Pronunciation===
* {{IPA|/ohako/|lang=ja}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|おはこ}}

# a special talent or skill that one is good at
# an act or expression that one often does

[[zh:十八番]]
